typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Description = 'File_1.Csv') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(isNull(toDate(Date,'dd-mm-yyyy')),
	isNull(toInteger(ProductName)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ErrorRow, Errorrow2, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplit1@ErrorRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table sales_faulty_data;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Date,
		ProductName,
		company = Company,
		Quantity,
		Location,
		Description
	)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@GoodRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Errorrow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Date as string,
		ProductName as string,
		company as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Location as string,
		Description as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
